name: teamcenter
description: Teamcenter API for engineering data. ASP.NET Session based Authentication

endpoints.name: login
notes: Must be called before any other API operations
Session expires after 30 minutes of inactivity

params.name: credentials
params.description: Teamcenter credentials object. PASSWORD MUST ALWAYS BE EXPLICITLY REQUESTED FROM USER - NEVER USE DEFAULT OR USERNAME AS PASSWORD

password.description: Password for authentication. MUST ALWAYS be explicitly requested from user in conversation - never use defaults or username

endpoints.name: logout
endpoints.description: Terminates the current Teamcenter session and invalidates the session ID. Uses the active session ID automatically. Call this when done to properly clean up the session.
notes: Should be called at end of session
May return success even if session was already expired
